io.name: TCISSCCB0110101_INBOUND
io.data: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <schema xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:p="http://schemas.jmims.com/mms/io/" xmlns:tns="http://schemas.jmims.com/mms/io/" targetNamespace="http://schemas.jmims.com/mms/io/"> <element name="root" type="tns:TCISSCCB0110101_inbound" /> <complexType name="TCISSCCB0110101_inbound"> <sequence> <element name="bsicDt"> <annotation> <documentation>기준일자</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="1" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="8" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="crdMemNo"> <annotation> <documentation>카드회원번호</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="1" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="9" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> </sequence> </complexType> </schema>

io.name: TCISSCCB0110101_OUTBOUND
io.data: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <schema xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:p="http://schemas.jmims.com/mms/io/" xmlns:tns="http://schemas.jmims.com/mms/io/" targetNamespace="http://schemas.jmims.com/mms/io/"> <element name="root" type="tns:TCISSCCB0110101_outbound" /> <complexType name="TCISSCCB0110101_outbound"> <sequence> <element name="rstRowcount"> <annotation> <documentation>결과건수</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="1" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="long"> <totalDigits value="5" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="rstList" type="tns:RST_LIST_TYPE"> <annotation> <documentation>결과리스트</documentation> <appinfo> <p:adjustLength category="variableField" lengthFieldURL="RST_ROWCOUNT" /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="1" /> </appinfo> </annotation> </element> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="RST_LIST_TYPE"> <sequence> <element name="chkYn"> <annotation> <documentation>체크여부</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="2" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="1" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="crdMemNo"> <annotation> <documentation>카드회원번호</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="2" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="9" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="imdtUpwdBndsAmt"> <annotation> <documentation>즉시상향한도금액</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="2" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="long"> <totalDigits value="19" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="tcpGrd"> <annotation> <documentation>TCP등급</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="2" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="6" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="cbGrd"> <annotation> <documentation>CB등급</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="2" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="6" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="bsGrd"> <annotation> <documentation>BS등급</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="2" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="6" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="spGrd"> <annotation> <documentation>SP등급</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="2" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="6" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="jkndCd"> <annotation> <documentation>직종코드</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="2" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="20" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="rfltYn"> <annotation> <documentation>반영여부</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="2" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="1" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> </sequence> </complexType> </schema>
